title: Radicals 部首
description: Study set that includes cards to / from radicals.

data.MM: This looks like a person with a long dress running behind them, just like the bride in a wedding ceremony.
Kinda looks like the sprint logo ?
A cross is branching off of a stool
Looks like plates drying on a rack
Looks messy, just like a thread (ie. computer science)
This looks like eye (目). If you go blind, your ear become your new sense of sight. Thus, it's a modified version of eye.
What sticks from the ground like in this radical? Flowers.
This is literally eye (目) that has legs (儿)
This looks like that guy from X-men that shoots lasers from the eye. What color is that laser? Red.
Looks like a top-down view of a car
ie. Midye. The legs are the shell, the middle part is eye of the clam.
